info.name: Tensorboard Dark (breeze)
info.description:
Dark theme for tensorboard (match port 60**), very minimal.

It is trying to blend nicely with dark-breeze theme (KDE theme)
info.additionalInfo: Starts implementing style for tensorboard v2
